title: Steve McQueen: Girls, Tricky
short_description: The new Modern Wing offers the museum’s first state-of-the-art gallery dedicated solely to the exhibition of works in film, video, and new media. Generously supported by leading Chicago collectors Donna and Howard Stone, this gallery is located on the Modern Wing’s first floor adjacent to the photography gallery. The first year of programming highlights four recent acquisitions that have yet to be displayed at the Art Institute.
